title: Assessment of nano silicon fertilizer effects on soil nutrients, enzyme activities, and microbial communities
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00223G, Paper
Pengfei Zhu, Shuang Chen, Yan Shi
Nano silicon fertilizer can provide new guidance in agricultural production and soil improvement by improving nutrients, enzyme activities and microbial diversity of soil.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
